archiefmat.titel: Resoluties en sententies van directeur en raden, en commissarissen van 'Mindere Questiën en Verschillen' (Kleine Zaken); ingekomen rekesten met daarop genomen beschikkingen; processtukken en bijlagen
archiefmat.titel_eng: Resolutions and sentences of Director and Councillors and Commissioners of 'minor affairs and differences' (Minor affairs); received petitions and related decrees; judicial papers and appendices
archiefmat.notes: No complete series; for most years only fragments are preserved. These inventory items were shipped from Cura çao to the Netherlands at a later date (1924) than the bulk of this archive. Consequently, these documents were described in a supplement to the inventory.
